Retreats in Germany

Book now

Overview

I am based in Munich/Germany and offer day retreats as well as weekend retreats throughout the year. On this page you'll find the next upcoming retreat with all information. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Practical info

Dates:

11 July 2020

Location:

F체ssen, Ostallg채u

Recommended for:

Om am See is a yoga festival with lots of great yoga teachers, yoga workshops, healing sessions, music and much more, surrounded by the beautiful mountains of Ostallgäu in front of lake Forgensee.

Price: EUR 92

Book now

FAQS

Feel free to contact me if you can't find the answer to your question.

Inclusions

* all day ticket 92€

* participation in all yoga classes and workshops

* music & dance

* kids play area

* food stores

* merchandising

* bbq area

Exclusions

  • Due to current Covid-19 regulations we can't provide any camping facilities
  • However, there's a campground in Füssen or maybe you have some friends nearby who are happy to offer to share their garden?
  • There will be no drinking water supplied on the festival so please bring your own. (Yes, you are allowed to take water with you). There will be food stores that provide drinks at a cost as well.

About F체ssen, Ostallg채u

Right in front of a crystal clear turquoise lake, surrounded by mountains with a view to castle Neuschwanstein we would like to meet up and do yoga, sing, dance, laugh, relax, SUP on the lake, eat well and enjoy the wonderful people and spirit. 

Yoga on the lake

Amazing view to castle Neuschwanstein

Good vibes

Join me now

Drop out of the hectic western daily life that you might live, recharge your body and soul by learning about mindfulness and exploring a place that is so wonderful that when you return home you will dream about and that will create a place within you that will give you the power and strength to balance struggles that life throws at us with more ease and love.
